name: Deep Below
description: Experience the tireless journey of a lone survivor caught deep underground striving to reach the surface using a unique and mysterious gauntlet that allows the impossible at your fingertips.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Newer Processor: Intel I5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 660 Storage: 800 MB available space Additional Notes: Using the game with the Oculus Rift will require a more powerful system

reviews.review_text: Plays well but there is a slight feeling that you are walking against a wind. Mechanics are solid but it just got dull for me around third smelting puzle as there is a disconnect with the moving smelting pots, and the strange stationary points as it makes turns that felt off. I figure that is far enough for me in a free game.
